<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-lockfilemanager-cpp-"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">/// An RAII helper object ensure that the unique lock file is removed.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Ensures that if there is an error or a signal before we finish acquiring the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">/// lock, the unique file will be removed. And if we successfully take the lock,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the signal handler is left in place so that signals while the lock is held</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="comment">/// will remove the unique lock file. The caller should ensure there is a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="comment">/// matching call to sys::DontRemoveFileOnSignal when the lock is released.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lockfilemanager-cpp-/removeuniquelockfileonsignal"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lockfilemanager-cpp-/removeuniquelockfileonsignal/#a2808d6ab8eaca1641b199df415589d0c">RemoveUniqueLockFileOnSignal</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Filename;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Someone else managed to create the lock file first. Read the process ID</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from the lock file.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((Owner = readLockFile(LockFileName))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Wipe out our unique lock file (it&#39;s useless now)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a921e0b01f22f9a37012450f9b5f0ccb7">sys::fs::remove</a>(UniqueLockFileName);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a645a607ffcccb12f16a5736db991e7d9">sys::fs::exists</a>(LockFileName)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The previous owner released the lock file before we could read it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to get ownership again.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There is a lock file that nobody owns; try to clean it up and get</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ownership.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((EC = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a921e0b01f22f9a37012450f9b5f0ccb7">sys::fs::remove</a>(LockFileName))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::string S(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;failed to remove lockfile &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">      S.append(std::string(UniqueLockFileName));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lockfilemanager/#a5c1d619b63ed612ce3102028fb6940af">setError</a>(EC, S);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since we own the lock, remove the lock file and our own unique lock file.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since we don&#39;t yet have an event-based method to wait for the lock file,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// use randomized exponential backoff, similar to Ethernet collision</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// algorithm. This improves performance on machines with high core counts</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// when the file lock is heavily contended by multiple clang processes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">std::chrono&#95;literals;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/exponentialbackoff">ExponentialBackoff</a> Backoff(std::chrono::seconds(MaxSeconds), 10ms, 500ms);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Wait first as this is only called when the lock is known to be held.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Backoff.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/exponentialbackoff/#a2e8404047337057e4fff7e416f28ce3b">waitForNextAttempt</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: implement event-based waiting</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a592297dd80c13e993380e2bf972721ac">sys::fs::access</a>(LockFileName.c&#95;str(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#ab3cde71d019a4b19046fa286973656ebadd7f7c3323353f547eb98a8efba37ed0">sys::fs::AccessMode::Exist</a>) ==</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a59739a4f15fb2ec57a6b7fcfe938546ba2e70fc89b08f26fa3fc77694c91e8f7a">errc::no&#95;such&#95;file&#95;or&#95;directory</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the original file wasn&#39;t created, somone thought the lock was dead.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a645a607ffcccb12f16a5736db991e7d9">sys::fs::exists</a>(FileName))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lockfilemanager/#a9973b06ec4b8e2f93a9308b85c1b8b30ae933c5a1f2e505b61d59df1e3937adef">Res&#95;OwnerDied</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lockfilemanager/#a9973b06ec4b8e2f93a9308b85c1b8b30a213a07aec4e7e7d016b3bd594daf9cc5">Res&#95;Success</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the process owning the lock died without cleaning up, just bail out.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!processStillExecuting((&#42;Owner).first, (&#42;Owner).second))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lockfilemanager/#a9973b06ec4b8e2f93a9308b85c1b8b30ae933c5a1f2e505b61d59df1e3937adef">Res&#95;OwnerDied</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
